name: Cappuccino
description: A classic espresso-based drink with steamed milk and a light layer of foam. Perfect for morning or afternoon, this drink balances the intensity of coffee with the smoothness of milk.
preparations: Pull a double shot of espresso (45g) into a warmed cup
Steam milk until it reaches 65-68Â°C, creating a light, silky foam
Pour the steamed milk over the espresso, holding back the foam
Top with a small amount of foam and dust with cocoa if desired
